info.name: Media Viewer
info.summary: Explore, show and share your media collections
info.description:
A media viewer that adds image and video viewing capabilities to Files view and Public Links.
**Features**
- Support for a large selection of image and video formats (depending on server setup) - Fullscreen, zoomable slideshow view integrated with the Files view and Public Links - Image rotation - Sort images by name or date - Image and video download straight from the slideshow - Native SVG support - Mobile support
info.author: Felix Heidecke
